post:
Sorry for any pain that this topic can cause to you, but this is the last time I am trying to transfer the VPSs I have from WeLoveServers.

With only **$15**, you can have one VPS with the following configuration

	6GB RAM
	6GB vSwap
	8 vCPU Cores
	75GB Disk space
	2000GB Bandwidth
	1Gbps uplink
	1x IPv4 address
	OpenVZ/SolusVM
	Paid until 01.10.2014 (more than 2 months)
	Renewed at $44 yearly

There are 4 available now.

The offer is valid until 30.07.2014. 

Many thanks in advance for supportive comments.

Many questions and answers can be found in 

  * http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/30393/transfer-2-vps-6gb-ram-6gb-swap-8-vcpu-cores-from-weloveservers
  * http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/27923/6-gb-ram-6gb-swap-8-vcpu-75-gb-ssd-cached-for-only-3-7-from-oct-2014
  * http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/25352/17-months-6-gb-ram-6gb-swap-8-vcpu-75-gb-ssd-cached-with-only-94
